Base variant

Notifications

Choose light notifications (default) to ensure readability for all applications (recommended especially when running Substratum in legacy mode). When using one of the dark/black solid/semi-transparent variants, issues might occur with apps that set their own notification colors.

Use legacy variants when using a ROM without full Substratum support (exposure commits), i.e. when using stock ROM!

Android System

  • Default: Use with Substratum-supported ROMs
  • legacy: Use when using a ROM without Substratum exposure commits

Settings accent

System accent

Accent color for System/SystemUI.

Default: match settings. Default variant needed on some legacy ROMs such as LineageOS on which opening the power menu leads to a device reboot otherwise. If you don't experience reboots when using a different variant than the default one here, it's recommended to select the other variant.

Reporting bugs

Before reporting any bugs, try following steps first:

  • Try rebooting your device after applying the theme
  • Make sure you are using the right variants
  • Make sure you are using the latest version of Substratum
  • Try uninstalling and re-installing the theme
  • Try cleaning the cache of Substratum (or the theming app that you're using)
  • Try uninstalling and re-installing Substratum
  • Check whether the issue already has been reported on the theme's github page and maybe there is already a known fix for it

When reporting bugs, please provide the following information:

  • ROM Version (stock ROM/custom ROM (which one)), Android version (?attr/androidVersion), release date for custom ROMs
  • Do you have full Substratum/OMS support or are you running Substratum in legacy mode?
  • Substratum version: ?attr/substratumVersion
  • Version of this theme: ?attr/themeVersion
  • The variants you selected
  • Information about your issue:
    1. If some colors are odd/texts are unreadable, please provide a screenshot and describe where it was taken!
    2. If an app crashes, please provide a logcat

To report a bug, create an issue on the github page (or provide additional information to an existing one).

Be nice! You don't pay me anything, and I don't feel the need to fix everything you tell me to; especially if you're not being friendly! Also, don't expect any response if you haven't provided the above listed relevant information!

Keep in mind that if you're not using a Substratum supported ROM, my means of providing support and fixing bugs are rather limited.

Don't report bugs by writing it in a review on google play, it's unlikely that I will look into it this way! REVIEWS ARE NOT FOR BUG REPORTS!

Source code

This theme was made open source, so anybody has the possibility to improve it to their likings! Good contributions are welcome! Code can be found on github.

Previous releases

If you experience some issues with the latest version that weren't present before, or you'd like to try out previous releases of this theme for other reasons, you can get them on the github releases page.
